title: ´Incredible´ Italy delivered ´biggest gift´ with Norway triumph, says Soncin
description: Andrea Soncin believes Italy delivered “the biggest gift” after reaching the semi-finals of Euro 2025 with a 2-1 win over Norway on Wednesday. Soncin watched on as Cristiana Girelli’s 90th-minute winner secured Italy’s place in the final four of a major competition for the first time since 1997. Italy had opened the scoring in the […] The post ´Incredible´ Italy delivered ´biggest gift´ with Norway triumph, says Soncin appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Bitesize Prediction: Operario vs CRB – 17/07/25
